# readme


```{bash}
duckdb -c "
    SELECT table_name, count(*) AS num_columns
    FROM information_schema.columns
    GROUP BY table_name
    ORDER BY table_name;
" dict.duckdb
```

```{bash}
snakemake --filegraph | dot -T png > dag.png
```
